ch.iserver.ace.application
Class DocumentManagerImpl

java.lang.Object
  ch.iserver.ace.application.DocumentManagerImpl
All Implemented Interfaces:
DocumentManager, ItemSelectionChangeListener, PreferenceChangeListener, EventListener
public class DocumentManagerImpl
extends Object
implements ItemSelectionChangeListener, PreferenceChangeListener, DocumentManager

Default implementation of the DocumentManager interface.

Description copied from interface: DocumentManager

saveDocument

public void saveDocument(DocumentItem item)
                  throws IOException
Description copied from interface: DocumentManager
Saves the given document to the associated file. It is an error to call this method with an item that has never been saved before.

Specified by:
saveDocument in interface DocumentManager
Parameters:
item - the document to save
Throws:
IOException - if there is a problem saving the document
See Also:
DocumentManager.saveDocument(ch.iserver.ace.application.DocumentItem)

saveDocumentAs

public void saveDocumentAs(File file,
                           DocumentItem item,
                           boolean copy)
                    throws IOException
Description copied from interface: DocumentManager
Saves a document into a new file. The file will be overwritten if it exists. The file is associated with the item, further calls to DocumentManager.saveDocument(DocumentItem) save the document to the new file. If the copy parameter is false, the file property of the item is set to the new file. Otherwise it is left as it is.

Specified by:
saveDocumentAs in interface DocumentManager
Parameters:
file - where to save the document
item - the document item to save
copy - whether this saveDocumentAs call should create a copy
Throws:
IOException - in case of IO problems
See Also:
DocumentManager.saveDocumentAs(java.io.File, ch.iserver.ace.application.DocumentItem, boolean)

closeDocument

public void closeDocument(DocumentItem item,
                          boolean shutdown)
Description copied from interface: DocumentManager
Closes the given document item. Unsaved changes will be discarded, so be careful to ask the user for confirmation. If the document has been published, it is concealed.

Specified by:
closeDocument in interface DocumentManager
Parameters:
item - the document to close
See Also:
ch.iserver.ace.application.DocumentManager#closeDocument(ch.iserver.ace.application.DocumentItem)

closeAllDocuments

public void closeAllDocuments()
Description copied from interface: DocumentManager
Closes all documents. The documents are concealed first if they were published.

Specified by:
